subject: Order
description_text:
Hi there, I ordered a 6 speed shifter from you guys on january 1â€™st and still have no tracking/update on the item. 

Please get back to me asap with any updates on shipping.

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Lee,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806415
